author: Kendall Baker, Jeff Tracy
title: How the Spanish flu pandemic led to the rise of baseball's greatest legend
description: In January 1918, the horrors of World War I were in their final year, and Major League Baseball was preparing for its 16th season. But beneath the surface, another deadly battle was brewing. They called it the "Spanish flu." The state of play: Over the next 1…

In January 1918, the horrors of World War I were in their final year, and Major League Baseball was preparing for its 16th season. But beneath the surface, another deadly battle was brewing. They called it the "Spanish flu."
